phrases: Damn it, this pisses me off.
Now, where did I put it?
He is become the most awful and disgusting criminal in Japan's history.
He is repeatedly committed murders ever since he was 12.
He raped and murdered two of them.
Letting their dog shit in front of someone else's house...
I am really thinking of keeping it
and putting it in the owner's pocket tomorrow morning.
Um... I left your milk over there.
You are not the usual milkman.
Yes, I am just covering this morning.
Because the third boy was from a rich family,
That is what led to his arrest.
I might just be picky, but the seal on this milk's lid is broken.
If that woman or her brat, Josuke, drank this milk,
my Stand, Aqua Necklace, could have possessed them!
You just keep going, do not you?
When the police infiltrated the area where the boy was being held,
they found a truly horrific sight.
The boy was dead, and his privates
had been chopped off and nailed to a pillar near the corpse.
Why the hell did not you clean up your dog's shit?
On top of that, you just threw your cigarette on the ground, did not you?
can just swallow my Stand and die.
So it seemed like that Stand had possessed the robber...
Or rather, it was just in his body.
No, I did not see him.
Damn it, my hair's not setting right.
That Stand's power is weak, but it can be controlled remotely.
It is the type that can somehow enter people.
I am heading to your house now.
Do not eat or drink anything until I get there.
Do not shower or use the bathroom, either.
I have not told my mom about you yet.
My mom's pretty tough, but it seems that she still loves Joseph Joestar,
and cries when she thinks about him.
She will know who you are with one look.
Josuke, where did this picture come from?
This is the milkman from earlier...
I just saw that thing go into my mom's mouth from the coffee!
Josuke, you want some coffee, too?
Could you put in some milk and sugar for me?
What should I do with it?
Angelo should be watching over your house from somewhere.
Do not take your eyes off that Stand.
Angelo, Criminal Condemned to Death, Escapes
There is no doubt that Angelo was able to escape prison and death row
But I still do not know the specifics of that Stand's power.
The game ends with a dead ball!
You need to get going, or you will be late!
That little brat and his hot mom!
I need to either get the cap off
or break open this bottle, somehow...
You really feel it when you work the night shift at my age.
Come to think of it, it is the same name.
So this is Officer Higashikata's house.
I have not seen him since I was 12.
Josuke, why are not you at school?
Are you allowed to take your gun home, Gramps?
I am just waiting for someone.
This is just a model gun.
I guess I win the first round in our weekly contest to scare each other.
You are not even trying to argue this time.
You are tired, are not you?
The number of strange deaths occurring
due to the center of the eye or ear
being destroyed has risen to seven as of this morning.
The police are trying to get to the bottom of these bizarre deaths,
which have only occurred in Morioh.
They are trying to determine if they were caused by illness or accident.
It definitely reeks of foul play to me.
I cannot help but feel like someone really dangerous is hiding in this city.
Morioh's masterpiece, beef tongue in miso.
After you finish your night shift, you always enjoy a shot of brandy.
Josuke, grab the bottle and get in the car.
Let us take it somewhere isolated.
Josuke Higashikata, this is all your fault!
It is all your fault for not keeping your eyes on me.
when I see cocky guys step into the depths of despair!
I will kill you, whatever it takes!
Gramps opened the cap on the bottle.
But there is nothing to worry about.
It is just a minor wound.
I have done it lots of times since I was a kid.
I even fixed my friend's broken bone...
I am going to be mad if you are messing around.
Did you really fall asleep because you had the night shift?
You do not need to try to scare me anymore!
It can be said that humans live by destroying.
In the midst of all that, your power is kinder than anything else.
But once a life is taken,
No matter the Stand, it cannot bring it back.
For 35 years, he protected this city as a police officer.
and when he heard news about
murders that sounded like Angelo's work,
he had the eyes of a man who was protecting his city.
There must be several bodies of people from this city
that have not been found yet.
There is no reason for his murders.
It is a hobby to him.
And he will keep killing, I am sure.
He is probably going to start by killing you and your mom.
I will protect this city and my mom in his place.
The funeral has ended, and his uniform hangs in the closet.
And behind it, the shoes, socks, shirts, and pants of a middle-aged man,
This is what I like, are neatly folded and lined up.
But eventually, they will probably be disposed of.
not wanting to throw them away since they hold such dear memories,
no one will ever wear them again.
Josuke probably does not want to see anyone right now.
Everything but canned drinks and foods is dangerous,
so do not consume anything else.
I had her go to a relative's house after the funeral.
She can come back after we kick Angelo's ass.
I am not pissed off or anything.
I just got a little worked up for a moment.
so it is up to you if you want to take out your anger on it.
By the way, that scar on your lip...
That is from when I punched you.
Cannot your Stand heal your wounds?
My Stand cannot heal my own wounds.
What if his Stand enters your body and starts tearing things up from the inside?
If it invades me, I lose.
You are going to try to trap my Stand in a bottle again?
That are not happening again, Josuke.
I know your powers very well now.
Tomorrow, or the day after tomorrow...
I will wait patiently for my chance.
He is come this close to see what is going on...
But these past three days, he has not made a single move.
I thought something seemed odd about you.
So you are a Stand user, too?
I have been waiting for this moment.
You guys cannot leave while it is raining!
He was just here all of a sudden, boiling the water.
He is twisted the faucet, too.
Angelo's Stand has entered the house.
He was not waiting for you to drink the water.
He was waiting for it to rain!
His Stand can move in the rain...
It can move freely in liquids.
We cannot capture him in the bottle.
If you inhale that, you are in trouble.
It seems like it will not even do any good to get out of here.
Angelo has already made several holes in the roof.
So it is dangerous to go upstairs, obviously, or outside.
I never would have thought a power
that uses water could be this terrifying.
The guy who killed my Gramps is this close.
I would not quite word it like that.
The wall's going to go back to normal.
Well, we have blocked the steam...
I knew you would break through the wall and come into this room!
When horse races or test answers end up exactly as I expect,
I cannot help but feel lucky from the bottom of my heart and laugh.
What Angelo just said is wrong, Jotaro.
Even when things end up exactly as I expect, I do not feel like laughing...
Not when it comes to Angelo.
Sorry, it is a bit gross.
I shredded up a rubber glove and swallowed it beforehand.
It appears the user's body is over there.
Y-You guys are not going to kill me, are you?!
Sure, I am an escaped death row inmate.
But just because I was found guilty by Japanese law
does not mean you guys have the right to judge me!
I killed your grandpa, but you have no right to kill me!
If you kill me, you will end up a cursed soul, just like me!
Do not go telling people what they can and cannot do.
No one's going to execute you.
Not me, and not Jotaro, either.
You are not going to be executed,
and you are not going back to jail.
Josuke, I will leave the rest to you.
Wh-What do you plan to do with me, you bastards?!
For all of those you killed, including my Gramps!
You are going to live forever in the city my Gramps protected.
Morioh City Landmark 1 The Angelo Stone Directions
One minute's walk from Morioh City Johzenji Street Bus Stop 3
The Angelo Stone is known as a landmark,
and a place where lovers meet.
It is admired by the people of the city,
Episode 3 The Niji mura Brothers, Part 1
